Row.Text: New Civilization and Leader - Jadwiga of Poland
Contains a new civilization and leader.
Fight alongside two other players to defend Poland from foreign invasions.

In this 60 turn scenario, you stand at the crossroads of Europe, protecting the fertile Polish homelands from a constant barraging of invaders from all directions. Rally your Winged Hussars and face off against Teutonic Knights and Ottoman Turks as you grow your civilization.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The player with best empire by standard scoring at end of the game is the winner.
